types.html:
haut la main

  1. hands down, with flying colours, by a long shot
    Il a battu son adversaire haut la main. ― He beat his opponent hands down.

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Not to be confused with haut les mains.
trans: hands down, with flying colours, by a long shot
